verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> a thing <S%H1697><s%> was revealed <S%H1540><s%> unto Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Belteshazzar; <S%H1095><s%> and the thing <S%H1697><s%> was true, <S%H571><s%> but the time appointed <S%H6635><s%> was long: <S%H1419><s%> and he understood <S%H995><s%> <S%H853><s%> the thing, <S%H1697><s%> and had understanding <S%H998><s%> of the vision. <S%H4758><s%>
In those <S%H1992><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> I <S%H589><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> mourning <S%H56><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> full <S%H3117><s%> weeks. <S%H7620><s%>

I ate <S%H398><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> pleasant <S%H2530><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> came <S%H935><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> nor wine <S%H3196><s%> in <S%H413><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did I anoint myself at all, <S%H5480><s%> <S%H5480><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> were fulfilled. <S%H4390><s%>

And in the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> as I <S%H589><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3027><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> river, <S%H5104><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is Hiddekel; <S%H2313><s%>

Then I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> whose loins <S%H4975><s%> were girded <S%H2296><s%> with fine gold <S%H3800><s%> of Uphaz: <S%H210><s%>

His body <S%H1472><s%> also was like the beryl, <S%H8658><s%> and his face <S%H6440><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of lightning, <S%H1300><s%> and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> as lamps <S%H3940><s%> of fire, <S%H784><s%> and his arms <S%H2220><s%> and his feet <S%H4772><s%> like in color <S%H5869><s%> to polished <S%H7044><s%> brass, <S%H5178><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a multitude. <S%H1995><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> Daniel <S%H1840><s%> alone <S%H905><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the vision: <S%H4759><s%> for the men <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me saw <S%H7200><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the vision; <S%H4759><s%> but <S%H61><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> quaking <S%H2731><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, so that they fled <S%H1272><s%> to hide themselves. <S%H2244><s%>

Therefore I <S%H589><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%> alone, <S%H905><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> vision, <S%H4759><s%> and there remained <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> in me: for my comeliness <S%H1935><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> me into corruption, <S%H4889><s%> and I retained <S%H6113><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>

Yet heard <S%H8085><s%> I <S%H853><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words: <S%H1697><s%> and when I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words, <S%H1697><s%> then was <S%H1961><s%> I <S%H589><s%> in a deep sleep <S%H7290><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> my face, <S%H6440><s%> and my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground. <S%H776><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> a hand <S%H3027><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> me, which set <S%H5128><s%> me upon <S%H5921><s%> my knees <S%H1290><s%> and upon the palms <S%H3709><s%> of my hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, O Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved, <S%H2530><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, and stand <S%H5975><s%> upright: <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5977><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee am I now <S%H6258><s%> sent. <S%H7971><s%> And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me, I stood <S%H5975><s%> trembling. <S%H7460><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto <S%H413><s%> me, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> Daniel: <S%H1840><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou didst set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine heart <S%H3820><s%> to understand, <S%H995><s%> and to chasten thyself <S%H6031><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> thy words <S%H1697><s%> were heard, <S%H8085><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> am come <S%H935><s%> for thy words. <S%H1697><s%>

But the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> withstood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H5048><s%> me one <S%H259><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> but, lo, <S%H2009><s%> Michael, <S%H4317><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the chief <S%H7223><s%> princes, <S%H8269><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> me; and I <S%H589><s%> remained <S%H3498><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> with <S%H681><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Persia. <S%H6539><s%>

Now I am come <S%H935><s%> to make thee understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> shall befall <S%H7136><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%> is for many days. <S%H3117><s%>

And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> such <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me, I set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground, <S%H776><s%> and I became dumb. <S%H481><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> one like the similitude <S%H1823><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my lips: <S%H8193><s%> then I opened <S%H6605><s%> my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and spoke, <S%H1696><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him that stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me, O my lord, <S%H113><s%> by the vision <S%H4758><s%> my sorrows <S%H6735><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> me, and I have retained <S%H6113><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength. <S%H3581><s%>

For how <S%H1963><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> my lord? <S%H113><s%> for as for me, <S%H589><s%> straightway <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6258><s%> there remained <S%H5975><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> strength <S%H3581><s%> in me, neither <S%H3808><s%> is there breath <S%H5397><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> in me.
Then there came again <S%H3584><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> me one like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> and he strengthened <S%H2388><s%> me,

And said, <S%H559><s%> O man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved, <S%H2530><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> be unto thee, be strong, <S%H2388><s%> yea, be strong. <S%H2388><s%> And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> me, I was strengthened, <S%H2388><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Let my lord <S%H113><s%> speak; <S%H1696><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast strengthened <S%H2388><s%> me.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he, Knowest <S%H3045><s%> thou wherefore <S%H4100><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee? and now <S%H6258><s%> will I return <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Persia: <S%H6539><s%> and when I <S%H589><s%> am gone forth, <S%H3318><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Greece <S%H3120><s%> shall come. <S%H935><s%>

But <S%H61><s%> I will show <S%H5046><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> that which is noted <S%H7559><s%> in the Scripture <S%H3791><s%> of truth: <S%H571><s%> and there is none <S%H369><s%> <S%H259><s%> that holdeth <S%H2388><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me in <S%H5921><s%> these things, <S%H428><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Michael <S%H4317><s%> your prince. <S%H8269><s%>
